CustomField.formula: IF ( AND( RecordType.DeveloperName <> "NDA", ISPICKVAL(Apttus__Status_Category__c,"In Authoring"), $Permission.CLM_Account_Manager_Permission, OR( $User.Id = OwnerId, CONTAINS($Label.CLM_Profiles, $Profile.Name)), OR( ISPICKVAL(Apttus__Status__c,"Ready for Review"), ISPICKVAL(Apttus__Status__c,"Other Party Review"))), HYPERLINK("/apex/Apttus__AgreementSubmitRequest?id=" &Id, IMAGE("/resource/Apttus__LightningResource/images/actions/submitrequest.png", "Submit Request"), "_self"), NULL)
CustomField.label: Submit Request to L&C
